detail_desc: Straight-cut shirt in heavy cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, a rounded hem and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short dress in a patterned weave with short, wide sleeves and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.
Sports top in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, decorative seams and long raglan sleeves.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with light, removable pads in the cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an opening with lacing at the back.

Jacquard-knit jacket with a stand-up collar and gold-coloured zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour piping, zipped side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
V-neck top woven in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and gathered seams down the front and back for a draped effect. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey.
Padded slippers in a soft knit with an ankle-high shaft with a faux fur trim and decorative bow with faux fur pompoms. Pile linings and insoles and soft with anti-slip protectors.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill. Slightly looser fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sweatshirt in a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and string back. The polyamide content of the briefs is recycled.

Straight-cut jacket in a lightly padded jacquard weave with a collar and press-studs down the front. Chest pockets with a press-stud, discreet side pockets and press-studs at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top and short sleeves.

Dress in softly draping, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with gathers for added width and soft draping. Lined.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Plastic hair claws. Width 2.5 cm.

Calf-length, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt with a raw-edge, scalloped hem. Jersey lining.

Blouse in a slub cotton weave with a small stand-up collar in lace and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lace details at the front and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved nursing top in a soft viscose weave with a boat neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Poncho in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads and sequins with a ribbed polo neck and fringed hem.
Top in a stretch rib knit with an off-centre V-neck and short sleeves.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Knee-length jersey skirt with a high, elasticated waist and contrasting colour side stripes.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, nepped sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Cap in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Fine-knit V-neck jumper in a soft viscose blend in a straight style with long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped, fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with a drawstring down the front and short sleeves.
Straight-cut shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, yoke and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Blouse in woven fabric with print stripes and a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit, and a rounded hem.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.

Oversized jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidered text detail on the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a zip down the front, front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Partly lined.
Top in soft, airy modal jersey with a low-cut back and short sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed organic cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, low crotch and straight legs with belt loops on one leg.

Dress in an airy, patterned weave with decorative gathers at the front of the neck and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Double-layered butterfly sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved jumpsuit in woven fabric with peak lapels and a wrapover front with concealed buttons. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets, a zip fly and tapered legs with creases.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Long-sleeved dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.
Straight-cut shirt in soft viscose twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and fabric badges at the top. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and lacing at the sides.
Glittery Alice band with a tulle-decorated crown that has pearly plastic beads on top.
Trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Tunic in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck and long sleeves with wide, flared, buttoned cuffs. Narrow detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a hood and zip down the front. Front pockets, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide panel at the waist for a more comfortable fit and flared legs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a hood. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Loafers with a decorative seam at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a zip fly with a button.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent fabric with a zip down the front and hood with an elastic drawstring. Yoke, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, a zipped chest pocket, side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Sports vest tops in fast-drying functional fabric. Loose fit with a racer back.
Wide, round-necked blouse in an airy cotton weave with covered buttons at the top, long raglan, balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waist and a button band with decorative buttons down the front. Gently flared with an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Slim Fit.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck with lacing at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.

Balconette bra in jersey with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, and a slightly wider fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps included.
T-shirt in patterned slub jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim that moulds to the body for a comfortable and flattering fit. High waist, zip fly and slim legs with hard-worn details and raw edges at the hems.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck and narrow ties at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs.Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Imitation leather sandals with narrow straps and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle at one side. Covered block heels 7.5 cm.
Patterned silk handkerchief. Size 33x33 cm.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in textured-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and ribbed trims.
